SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.account_no,b.ENDING_:6,c.ENDING_:6 from gl_account a,gl_balance b,gl_balance c where a.co_id=':1' and b.curr_id=':3' and b.co_id=a.co_id and b.BR_ID=':2' and b.account_no=a.account_no and b.FISCAL_YEAR=:5 and c.curr_id=':4' and c.co_id=a.co_id and c.BR_ID=':2' and c.account_no=a.account_no and c.FISCAL_YEAR=:5
